% Add images list into TOC && document
\listoffigures
\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{\VAR{list_of_images_title}}
%
% Add list of tables into TOC && document
\listoftables
\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{\VAR{list_of_tables_title}}
%
% Add list of listings into TOC && document
\listof{literalblock}{\VAR{list_of_listings_title}}
\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{\VAR{list_of_listings_title}}
